item.name: mcp:MD_Metadata
item.description: root entity which defines metadata about a resource or resources

item.name: mcp:MD_DataIdentification
item.description: information required to identify an Australian Marine Community Profile dataset (Australian Marine Community Profile extension to ISO19115/19139)

item.name: mcp:currency
item.description: Describes the temporal currency of the resource (Australian Marine Community Profile extension to ISO19115/19139)

item.name: mcp:revisionDate
item.description: Date the metadata was last revised (Australian Marine Community Profile extension to ISO19115/19139)

item.name: mcp:samplingFrequency
item.description: To describe the frequency of the sampled resource (Australian Marine Community Profile extension to ISO19115/19139)

item.name: mcp:temporalAggregation
item.description: Describes the temporal aggregation of the resource (Australian Marine Community Profile extension to ISO19115/19139)

item.name: mcp:EX_TemporalExtent
item.description: time period covered by the content of the dataset

item.name: mcp:beginTime
item.description: start of time period covered by the dataset (deprecated - use gml: elements in the extent element instead)

item.name: mcp:endTime
item.description: end of time period covered by the dataset (deprecated - use gml: elements in the extent element instead)

item.name: mcp:MD_CreativeCommons
item.description: Creative Commons Constraints can be chosen in this element

item.name: mcp:dataParameters
item.description: Describes the Parameters or variables included in dataset

item.name: mcp:dataParameter
item.description: Details about a specific Parameter, including he various names and labels used for that parameter; the unit-of-measurement (UOM) used; the minimum and maximum values measured in the dataset, and a description of the parameter the definitions of the parameters information

item.name: mcp:parameterName
item.description: Specific Parameter's name or label. Details include whether this is a shortname, longname, code or "other". It also the details of a vocabulary list (if one is known) that the label or name belongs to, and the label's definition

item.name: mcp:name
item.description: Name of Parameter or Unit of Measurement (UOM) depending on parent

item.name: mcp:type
item.description: Type of Name - typically: long, short, code or other

item.name: mcp:usedInDataset
item.description: Specific Parameter or UOM name being discussed in this element

item.name: mcp:vocabularyListURL
item.description: Version of the parameter vocabulary list that includes and defines this name; Only use this, if the name actually is defined in a parameter or "UOM" vocabulary list that is available from the web

item.name: mcp:vocabularyListVersion
item.description: Version of the parameter vocabulary list that includes and defines this name;

item.name: mcp:vocabularyListAuthority
item.description: Authority usually means a body or organisation regulating a vocabulary list. Use this field if the shortname or longname or param-code are defined in a parameter or "UOM" vocabulary list that is defined, maintained or regulated by a particular body or organisation

item.name: mcp:parameterMinimumValue
item.description: Minimum value measured - for this parameter, within this dataset

item.name: mcp:parameterMaximumValue
item.description: Maximum value measured - for this parameter, within this dataset

item.name: mcp:parameterDescription
item.description: Description of Param

item.name: mcp:localDefinition
item.description: Local definition of Param or UOM; Used where an external vocabulary hasn't been used, or where an external vocab's definition is insufficient

item.name: mcp:parameterUnits
mcp:MD_DataCommons
item.description: Data Commons Constraints can be chosen in this element

item.name: mcp:attributionConstraints
item.description: Describes how and when the resource should be attributed as well as who the resource should be attributed to. For example: Jones, C, 3D Mining Data, International Journal of Mining, University Press, must be cited whenever this data is referred to in a paper.

item.name: mcp:derivativeConstraints
item.description: Describes the constraints on products that may be derived from this resource.

item.name: mcp:commercialUseConstraints
item.description: Describes what the constraints are if you want to make use of this resource commercially.

item.name: mcp:collectiveWorksConstraints
item.description: Describes what the constraints are if you wish to include this resource in a collective work.

item.name: mcp:otherConstraints
item.description: Describes any constraints on using this resource that are not captured by the other constraint fields.
